info.title: eBaoCloud OpenAPI for Mobile BFF (Backends for Frontends)
info.description:
This document is the API specification for the eBaoCloud Life part. To practice and run the APIs in this document, you need to apply an eBaoCloud tenant account(starting from a sandbox account instead of production account) first.
Contact liliang.zhu@ebaotech.com for more information and trial using. # Built on Tue Mar 13 2018, 19:36:06 +08:00 # Versioning API version| Date |Comments

addressId.description: Address internal serial number, UUID type

fill1.description: Declaration item to answer the content 1, character type, the content with the different items and different

fill10.description: Declaration item to answer the content 10, character type, the content with the different items and different

fill2.description: Declaration item to answer the content 2, character type, the content with the different items and different

fill3.description: Declaration item to answer the content 3, character type, the content with the different items and different

fill4.description: Declaration item to answer the content 4, character type, the content with the different items and different

fill5.description: Declaration item to answer the content 5, character type, the content with the different items and different

fill6.description: Declaration item to answer the content 6, character type, the content with the different items and different

fill7.description: Declaration item to answer the content 7, character type, the content with the different items and different

fill8.description: Declaration item to answer the content 8, character type, the content with the different items and different

fill9.description: Declaration item to answer the content 9, character type, the content with the different items and different

chargePeriod.description:
Payment period type, non-empty
1 - single
2 - per year
3 to a certain age
4 - whole life

coveragePeriod.description:
Coverage type
1 - whole life
2 - per year
3 - Cover to a certain age
4 - per month
5 - per day

premium.description: Insurance premium, non empty when calculate SA base on premium

unit.description: Product unit, non empty when by unit insurance

accountType.description:
Account type, 2 debit card
8 - credit card

bankAccountCity.description: The city, the bank account belongs to

bankAccountProvince.description: The province, the bank account belongs to

creditCardType.description:
Credit card type, if not credit card, be empty
1 - Master
2 - Visa
3 - BCA
4 - JCB

debitCreditType.description:
Account use
0 - pay and use
1 - fee
2 - refund

paymentMethod.description:
First time payment method, integer
1 - cash
2 - check
3 - bank transfer
30 - credit card

paymentMethodNext.description:
Renewal payment method, integer
1 - cash
2 - check
3 - bank transfer
30 - credit card

post.description: 根据支付回调参数，更新投保单信息，并调用保险公司生效接口

post.summary: 安心支付平台支付回调
post.description: 根据支付回调参数，更新投保单信息，并调用安心核心系统生效接口

parameters.name: payRemark
parameters.description: Pay Remark(when failed , show failure reason)

post.description: 通过eBaoCloud-Li计算保费
通过eBaoCloud-Li进行利益演示
计算保费并校验投核保规则，如果通过，则生成投保单号
投核保后收费承保
计算保费并校验投保风险
使用httpbasic方式验证, 成功登录后重置数据库中的用户openId
调用eBaoCloud的保费计算接口进行保费计算

get.description: 按投保单号取得投保单
按用户ID取得其所有投保单

post.description: 根据检索条件返回符合条件的投保单
保存或更新投保单
更新投保单部分信息（核保结果，电子保单下载地址，投保单状态）
更新投保单状态
验证签名
生成签名
调用保代公司的预约接口
调用保代公司的保单同步接口
调用保代公司的投保单同步接口
调用对应保险公司的投保接口
调用对应保险公司的生效接口
调用对应保险公司的核保接口

get.description: 根据appId取得微信公众号的Js Config
根据appId和code取得微信用户的openId和AccessToken

get.summary: 取得微信用户的基本信息
get.description: 根据appId，code以及验证方式取得微信用户的基本信息
